item.title: About
item.description: It is quite some time since I first decided to start my own blog with a focus on software development, involving code snippets, short tutorials, and discussions around daily programming madness. I am always open to discussions, innovative ideas and potential collaborations. Feel free to ping me anytime! For a complete CV, scroll down at the bottom of the page. Enjoy! Education I am currently finishing up my MSc in Computer Science at Vrije Universiteit van Amsterdam (VU) & Universiteit van Amsterdam (UvA) at Amsterdam, the Netherlands.
